last Thurs I recorded @o11ycast with @lizthegrey, @jessitron & @krisnova, then a panel with @nora_js & Erin McKeown. got me thinking @ when I rec'd this feedback:

"it's too hard to keep track of who's talking when there's more than one woman's voice per episode"
